import React from "react"; import {useState} from "react"; import {register} from '.././services/api.js'; function Register() { const[form,setForm] = useState({ name: "", username:"", email:"", password:"" }) const[errors,setErrors] = useState(null) const handleInputChange = (e)=>{ setForm({...form,[e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } const handleSubmit = async ()=>{ // console.log(form); const result = await register(form); console.log(result) } return (
Register an account
); } export default Register;
